We love to hear from readers. Send us your story ideas, feedback on what you’ve read or cool things you are doing in your stores—we want to hear it all!

Editor-in-Chief

Advertising
Explore our media kit to see how we can continue to support your brand awareness campaigns, B2B lead generation efforts, and thought leadership marketing strategy through our digital media offerings, print publications and live events designed specifically for the convenience and fuel retailing industry.

Stacey Dodge (sdodge@convenience.org)
Director, Advertising
Southeast 
(703) 518-4211

Press Inquiries

Vice President of Strategic Industry Initiatives
(703) 518-4272 
 
Press Releases
NACS members can have their press release shared in the member news section of NACS Daily and NACS Magazine. Send your releases to news@convenience.org.
 
Subscriptions and Address Changes
If you need help renewing, updating or canceling your subscription, contact us at nacsmagazine@convenience.org.
 
Mailing Address
NACS
1600 Duke Street, Suite 700
Alexandria, VA 22314
